GK23jonart_pu:2733: dyām āruhya tadīyadhūmakapaṭāt prāptā punas tanmaho yat so 'yaṃ
GK23jonart_pu:2735: ṛtupatiś śiśireṇa samatsaro 'py ativiruddhakaro na hitas sthitaḥ /
GK23jonart_pu:2736: yadi bhuvaṃ śiśiro na vināśayet kim iva nāma madhur vata yojayet //
GK23jonart_pu:2739: pretadehās tadā kecit tyaktā gūḍhaṃ jalāntare /
GK23jonart_pu:2740: araṇye kecana tyaktā nikhātā bandhubhiḥ pare // JRt_B.1318 //
GK23jonart_pu:2742: prajā vītabhayā kāṃścit pretān gūḍham adāhayan // JRt_B.1319 //
GK23jonart_pu:2743: doṣān dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ rājñā saidamakke nirākṛte /
GK23jonart_pu:2744: adahan prakaṭaṃ pretadehān ahani bāndhavāḥ // JRt_B.1320 //
GK23jonart_pu:2747: bhoktuṃ rājyaṃ paitṛkaṃ tad dhātrā dattaṃ saṭhakkuraḥ /
GK23jonart_pu:2750: sadanaṃ sadhanaṃ jassaratho 'py āgād vimucyatām // JRt_B.1323 //
GK23jonart_pu:2757: vivṛddhayavanādhikāravaravipravīrair viṭair bhaṭṭaiḥ kuṭilavartmagair mathitamohitāś ca prajāḥ
GK23jonart_pu:2758: surejyadhiṣaṇaṃ vicāracaturaṃ paraṃ ṭhakkuraṃ nirīkṣya yuyuje vicārapadanirṇaye merakam // senādhipatyaṃ vīrāya ṭhakkurāyogratejase /
GK23jonart_pu:2766: bhāṅgilaviṣayaṃ bhūbhṛt sa tulāyāṃ dadau nṛpaḥ /
